segments.advisor_message: So, uh, let’s talk about your expenses, right? You know, uh, it’s good to, um, understand who’s, like, responsible for each one. Like, who’s the o-owner of this expense you have?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, um, I’m the one covering most of it, it’s, uh, I think my car insurance, right? It’s something like, um, I pay, like, hundred bucks every month. It’s, uh, pretty important too, I guess.
